00033 class MIXIM_API Signal {
00034 public:
00040   typedef ConcatConstMapping<std::multiplies<double> > MultipliedMapping;
00042   typedef std::list<ConstMapping*> ConstMappingList;
00043 
00044 protected:
00046   int senderModuleID;
00048   int senderFromGateID;
00050   int receiverModuleID;
00052   int receiverToGateID;
00054   simtime_t sendingStart;

00070   ConstMappingList attenuations;

00073   MultipliedMapping* rcvPower;

00075 protected:
00082   void markRcvPowerOutdated() {
00083     if(rcvPower){
00084       if(propagationDelay != 0) {
00085         assert(rcvPower->getRefMapping() != power);
00086         delete rcvPower->getRefMapping();
00087       }
00088       delete rcvPower;
00089       rcvPower = 0;
00090     }
00091   }

00187   void addAttenuation(ConstMapping* att) {
00188     //assert the attenuation wasn't already added to the list before
00189     assert(std::find(attenuations.begin(), attenuations.end(), att) == attenuations.end());
00190 
00191     attenuations.push_back(att);
00192 
00193     if(rcvPower)
00194       rcvPower->addMapping(att);
00195   }
00196 
00204   ConstMapping* getTransmissionPower() {
00205     return power;
00206   }
00207 
00215   const ConstMapping* getTransmissionPower() const {
00216     return power;
00217   }
00218 
00223   Mapping* getBitrate() const {
00224     return bitrate;
00225   }
00226 
00231   const ConstMappingList& getAttenuation() const {
00232     return attenuations;
00233   }
00234 
00242   MultipliedMapping* getReceivingPower() {
00243     if(!rcvPower)
00244     {
00245       ConstMapping* tmp = power;
00246       if(propagationDelay != 0) {
00247         tmp = new ConstDelayedMapping(power, propagationDelay);
00248       }
00249       rcvPower = new MultipliedMapping(tmp,
00250                         attenuations.begin(),
00251                         attenuations.end(),
00252                         false, Argument::MappedZero);
00253     }
00254 
00255     return rcvPower;
00256   }
00257 
00263   cModule *getReceptionModule() const {return receiverModuleID < 0 ? NULL : simulation.getModule(receiverModuleID);}
00264 
00270   cGate *getReceptionGate() const;
00271
